situation: During an interactive math lesson using a smartboard, the board malfunctions and stops responding to touch. M grew increasingly anxious and started pacing around the classroom, vocalizing loudly.
action: The teacher aide tried restarting the board several times while ignoring M's distress. M was then asked to sit quietly until the board was operational again without any attempt to redirect or reassure.
effect: M remained anxious and agitated throughout the lesson, unable to focus on alternative activities. This led to disruption not only for him but also for the rest of the class.
